Pick one of the following datasets, depending on your team number

1) pigweight
2) beattheblues
3) dental
4) rats
5) tolerance
6) fev1
7) renergie

Answer the following question

1) is the database in long format?
2) identify the time variable
3) are the number of time period the same for each individual
4) are there missing values
5) which variables are fixed in time? which vary
6) create a spaghetti plot!
